tool.help:
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/tools/frogs/FROGS_logo.png :height: 144 :width: 110
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
What it does
Multiple alignment with `PyNAST <http://biocore.github.io/pynast/>`_ (if you have an alignment template file) or with `Mafft <http://mafft.cbrc.jp/alignment/software>`_ (if you haven't an aligned template file) and built a phylogenetic tree with `FastTree <http://www.microbesonline.org/fasttree/>`_.
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
Inputs/Outputs
.. class:: h3
Input
**OTUs file**:
The OTUs sequence file (format `FASTA <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FASTA_format>`_). Attention: FROGS Tree is only working on less than 10000 sequences!
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/tools/frogs/frogs_tree_otufile.png
**(optional) Template alignment file**:
A pre-aligned database of sequences (the “template” sequence) (format `multiple alignement <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_sequence_alignment>`_).
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/tools/frogs/frogs_tree_templatefile.png
**OTUs biom file**:
The OTUs biom file (format `biom1 <http://biom-format.org/documentation/format_versions/biom-1.0.html>`_). These file is the result of FROGS.
.. class:: h3
Outputs
**Newick file** (tree.nwk):
Newick file (format `nxh <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newick_format>`_).
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/tools/frogs/frogs_tree_treefile.png
Use 'phyloviz' of Galaxy to view Newick file.
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/tools/frogs/frogs_tree_view_phyloviz.png :height: 434 :width: 249
**Html file** (summary.html):
The summary of OTUs in and out of phylogenetic tree(format `HTML <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML>`_).
.. class:: infomark page-header h2
